description: Test your knowledge of famous artworks, artists, and art movements.
name: Art I

questions.description: Who painted the famous artwork "Starry Night"?
Which art movement is characterized by distorted and exaggerated depictions of reality?
What material is commonly associated with sculptor Auguste Rodin's masterpiece "The Thinker"?
Which color is NOT part of the subtractive color model used in traditional art?
Which famous artist is known for his "Campbell's Soup Cans" series?
What art movement emphasized geometric shapes, primary colors, and non-representational forms?
Which Renaissance artist created the fresco "The Last Supper"?
What is the technique of applying paint thickly to create texture in a painting called?
Which famous Mexican artist is celebrated for her self-portraits and vibrant use of color?
